cloud-fonts

exclusive and latest versions of Newtypography Webfonts before anyone else

Modal title

Cloud-fonts is the place to use the latest versions of Newtypography webfonts.

Modal title

Use of the fonts on cloud-fonts.com is completely free.

To use fonts from cloud-fonts.com, simply add the line 

<link href="http://www.cloud-fonts.com/format.php?font=FONTNAME" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">

within the <head> </head> of your webpage

Text on your web pages can then be set with the font by using the font-family tag, like this;

font-family: 'FONTNAME';

If a bold version of the font is supported, just use the css rules;

font-weight:bold;

or, you can use the css rule;

font-weight:700;

or, the html tags;



to set text with the bold version of that font.
